description: This file provides a Python module for interfacing with Supabase's authentication API, including functions for sign-up, login, refresh, logout, and retrieving user information via HTTP requests with appropriate error handling.

methods.name: Tuple[str,str] _get_supabase_env()
methods.description: Fetches the Supabase URL and service key from environment variables, raising an error if either is missing.

methods.name: Dict[str,str] _default_headers(api_key: str)
methods.description: Generates common headers for Supabase API calls, including the API key and authorization.

methods.name: Dict[str,Any] supabase_signup(email: str, password: str, name: Optional[str] = None, email_redirect_to: Optional[str] = None)
methods.description: Registers a new user with Supabase Auth, optionally with a name and email redirect URL.

methods.name: Dict[str,Any] supabase_login(email: str, password: str)
methods.description: Logs in a user with email and password to obtain access and refresh tokens.

methods.name: Dict[str,Any] supabase_refresh(refresh_token: str)
methods.description: Refreshes the authentication session using a refresh token.

methods.name: None supabase_logout(access_token: str)
methods.description: Logs out the current user by revoking their access token.

methods.name: Dict[str,Any] supabase_get_user(access_token: str)
methods.description: Retrieves the current user information using the access token.

ctags.name: supabase_login
ctags.pattern: /^def supabase_login(email: str, password: str) -> Dict[str, Any]:$/

ctags.name: supabase_signup
ctags.pattern: /^def supabase_signup(email: str, password: str, name: Optional[str] = None, email_redirect_to: Op/
ctags.signature: (email: str, password: str, name: Optional[str] = None, email_redirect_to: Optional[str] = None)
